alert.note: Alert for Aurora; Bon Homme; Brule; Charles Mix; Douglas; Gregory; Hutchinson; Yankton (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued January 31 at 9:05AM MST until January 31 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT LATE THIS MORNING THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON FOR PORTIONS OF SOUTH CENTRAL AND SOUTHEAST SOUTH DAKOTA... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 050, 057, 058, 063, 064, 065, 068, AND 069... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zones 057 and 058. * WIND...Southwest winds will increase by mid-day Monday and become strong in the afternoon. Sustained winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph will be possible. * HUMIDITY...Lowest relative humidity values may fall between 10 and 25 percent by the middle of the afternoon. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Aurora; Bon Homme; Brule; Charles Mix; Douglas; Gregory; Hutchinson; Yankton
